todos.name: Structure the Json.
todos.description: JSON should contain a boolean for the status of the task as well as a user name.

todos.name: Create an API to get the JSON place holder.
todos.description: A second project to be created using json-server package and it represents our server.

todos.name: Create the view of the list.
todos.description: Show that data is presented correctly.

todos.name: Embed pagination to the list.
todos.description: each page should represent only 20 todos, no reference of the pages should be inserted in the JSON.

todos.name: Create a PUT request.
todos.description: Whenever a user checks a to do list update the JSON that it is completed.

todos.name: Include a Delete button.
todos.description: When user presses on it, it should send a DELETE request to the mock server.

todos.name: Allow user to add to the list.
todos.description: Include an input field and a submit button that sends a POST request to the mock server.

todos.name: Sort list by user.
todos.description: Create a dropdown list containing users and sort the list based on the choice.

todos.name: Include a toggle button.
todos.description: The toggle button on shows completed tasks only and off shows all tasks.

todos.name: Make the page look presentable.
todos.description: Include CSS to make the page presentable.

todos.name: Separate responsibilities.
todos.description: Create a file for each component and divide the view into smaller components and communicate using props.

todos.name: Make the current page different in terms of the style of the page button.
